rooms.description: A welcoming space for receiving guests with appropriate lighting and Vastu alignment.
Spacious living area with colonial design elements and proper orientation per Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living room for communal dining, ensuring good airflow and natural lighting.
Well-equipped kitchen with modern colonial elements; positioned per Vastu guidelines for auspicious energy.
Guest bedroom designed to maintain privacy and comfort.
Storage space for household appliances and cleaning supplies.
Largest bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, positioned in the north-east to enhance positivity.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort.
Common bathroom for the first floor bedrooms.
Dedicated study or home office area; designed with colonial aesthetics and proper Vastu orientation.
Two-car garage designed for efficient use of space with additional storage areas.
